title: Amazing Ancient Monument
text: This is an ancient monument, and I couldn’t believe that I was standing here. The scenery was jaw-dropping, and the picture opportunities are limitless. This is surely a must if you are in Athens and it will not disappoint you. Trust me.

title: Nice full day cruise
text: We had a full day cruise, and it offers me an opportunity to visit some islands and feel their diversity. I was so fascinated about how every island differs from one another. Everyone has its unique charm, and each had its attractiveness. I would surely go back here again
place: Full Day Cruise to Greek Islands from Athens: Poros - Hydra - Aegina
